name: One Room Two Stage
description:
This is very simple platformer game, where both level has same map layout but different orientation. First level you play as "normal" character, but in second level you can double jump and ccan walk into smaller place.

You need to collect the key (small yellow block) to open the door (brown block) to finish a level.

Control :

  • A / Left Arrow : Moving left
  • D / Right Arrow : Moving right
  • W / Up Arrow : Jump
